trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZA003_04182_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Toffwyb seems excited to meet a real-life adventurer.
TEXT_AKTKZA003_04182_TODO_00<tab>Deliver the books.
TEXT_AKTKZA003_04182_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Toffwyb.

TEXT_AKTKZA003_04182_TOFFWYB_000_001<tab>Are you... Are you one of those adventuring types I've heard so much about!? Oh, but this is perfect! I just happen to have an errand of the kind that adventurers love! Or so I'm told.

TEXT_AKTKZA003_04182_TOFFWYB_000_002<tab>I'm holding on to some volumes my customers ordered in, but instead of coming to pick them up, they've all decided that they want their goods delivered. So, I find myself in need of a delivery drudge...er, person. Might that person be you!?
TEXT_AKTKZA003_04182_TOFFWYB_000_003<tab>Huzzah! Let me give you the details, then. All in all, there are three books on the delivery docket.

TEXT_AKTKZA003_04182_TOFFWYB_000_004<tab>The first, <var 1A 02 /var>Ishgardian Astrology: A Comprehensive Theory<var 1A 01 /var>, should be handed to the servant at Albright Manor. <var 1A 02 /var>The White Yonder<var 1A 01 /var> is for a certain talkative booklover who you'll know by the constant stream of chatter. And the last, <var 1A 02 /var>Narrow Road through the Deep Grass<var 1A 01 /var>, goes to one of the toughest, most unflappable gleaners I have ever met.

TEXT_AKTKZA003_04182_TOFFWYB_000_005<tab>I'll just mark their locations on this handy map...like so. The books are bought and paid for─no need to collect any coin─but do return to me for your own reward!
TEXT_AKTKZA003_04182_TOFFWYB_000_006<tab>If you just throw the books in the harbor, I <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> find out. Not that I think you would! ...I'm watching you.
TEXT_AKTKZA003_04182_MAIDINSEVESTRE_000_007<tab>Welcome to Albright Manor! ...Do you have an appointment?
TEXT_AKTKZA003_04182_MAIDINSEVESTRE_000_008<tab>Ah, yes, one copy of <var 1A 02 /var>Ishgardian Astrology: A Comprehensive Theory<var 1A 01 /var>, just as his lordship requested.

TEXT_AKTKZA003_04182_MAIDINSEVESTRE_000_009<tab>I must confess to some confusion, however... What interest would his lordship, an esteemed practitioner of Sharlayan astrology, have in such an outdated Ishgardian discipline?
TEXT_AKTKZA003_04182_MAIDINSEVESTRE_000_010<tab>...Not that I am in any position to question his lordship's reading habits, of course. Ahem. On your way, then.

TEXT_AKTKZA003_04182_CHATTYBIBLIOPHILIA_000_011<tab>Please tell me you've brought my new book! I've been waiting for what feels like <var 1A 02 /var>ages<var 1A 01 /var> for the latest shipment to arrive!

TEXT_AKTKZA003_04182_CHATTYBIBLIOPHILIA_000_012<tab>Yes! Finally! Did you know <var 1A 02 /var>The White Yonder<var 1A 01 /var> was written by a lad of fourteen years? I myself questioned how reliable such a work could possibly be, but a Far Eastern colleague with whom I've been exchanging correspondence says he absolutely swears by it.

TEXT_AKTKZA003_04182_CHATTYBIBLIOPHILIA_000_013<tab>It describes the wonders of the Abalathian Sea of Clouds in exquisite detail, and is, by all accounts, a roaring good read. The bit about the fighting paissas is said to be an especially entertaining episode.
TEXT_AKTKZA003_04182_CHATTYBIBLIOPHILIA_000_014<tab>Well, I should let you return to your deliveries and whatnot. Thank you kindly for putting this long-awaited treat into my ever-so-grateful hands!
TEXT_AKTKZA003_04182_FEARLESSGLEANER_000_015<tab>...Something I can help you with?
TEXT_AKTKZA003_04182_FEARLESSGLEANER_000_016<tab>Ah, is that my book? Good. I need it for my journey.

TEXT_AKTKZA003_04182_FEARLESSGLEANER_000_017<tab>I usually don't have a great deal of time for reading, but as I'm leaving for Othard on requisition duty, I wanted to do some research on Far Eastern cultures. I know little of the peoples of the Azim Steppe...

TEXT_AKTKZA003_04182_FEARLESSGLEANER_000_018<tab>Hm... It says here that “there are fifty-one distinct Xaela tribes, each with their own customs and traditions. The Buduga, for example, are exclusively male, and are known for kidnapping male outsiders to replenish lost numbers...”
TEXT_AKTKZA003_04182_FEARLESSGLEANER_000_019<tab>Is...is this accurate!? I'll need to tread carefully, it seems. Thank you for the timely delivery.
TEXT_AKTKZA003_04182_TOFFWYB_000_020<tab>All safely delivered? Hah! Of course they were!

TEXT_AKTKZA003_04182_TOFFWYB_000_021<tab>My shop is well known for carrying publications not only from Sharlayan authors, but from all manner of foreign chroniclers and tale-tellers. Meaning every time a new shipment comes in, I'm faced with an avalanche of work.
TEXT_AKTKZA003_04182_TOFFWYB_000_022<tab>I would've been buried alive without your assistance today, so here's a little something to show my gratitude. Go on, you've earned it!
